title: Palestinians recount scenes of desperation in northern Gaza amid offensive

content: Many are feared to be missing under the rubble of Rafiq Hariri University Hospital, Lebanon’s Health Ministry said. Israel’s military said it hit a Hezbollah target.

title: Blinken to reiterate warning on halting assistance to Israel

content: Ukraine sees joining NATO as a vital security guarantee to protect it from Russian President Vladimir Putin’s plans to take over the country.
summary: Ukraine sees joining NATO as a vital security guarantee to protect it from Russian President Vladimir Putin’s plans to take over the country.

title: FBI investigating alleged leak of U.S. documents on Israeli war plan
content: Top-secret documents, which surfaced on the Telegram messaging app, contain U.S. intelligence on Israel’s potential plans for a retaliatory attack on Iran.
summary: Top-secret documents, which surfaced on the Telegram messaging app, contain U.S. intelligence on Israel’s potential plans for a retaliatory attack on Iran.

title: 950-year-old coins unearthed by treasure hunters are U.K.’s highest-value find
content: The coins, which date from 1066 to 1068, were found in the Chew Valley in England. They were purchased by the South West Heritage Trust for £4.3 million ($5.6 million).
summary: The coins, which date from 1066 to 1068, were found in the Chew Valley in England. They were purchased by the South West Heritage Trust for £4.3 million ($5.6 million).

title: Israeli forces strike Beirut suburb and southern Lebanon
Woman drops phone, gets stuck upside-down in rock crevice looking for it
content: A woman in Australia’s Hunter Valley region was stuck hanging by her feet in a rock crevice, New South Wales Ambulance said. It took seven hours to free her.
summary: A woman in Australia’s Hunter Valley region was stuck hanging by her feet in a rock crevice, New South Wales Ambulance said. It took seven hours to free her.

title: Israeli airstrikes hit near Beirut hospital
India says it has reached a deal with China to patrol disputed border
content: The agreement, announced by India’s foreign secretary, marks a major thaw four years after bloody clashes between soldiers on the border tanked bilateral relations.
summary: The agreement, announced by India’s foreign secretary, marks a major thaw four years after bloody clashes between soldiers on the border tanked bilateral relations.

title: New Zealand airport caps goodbye hugs to 3 minutes to avoid traffic jams
content: “I’m not a big hugger. Twenty seconds tops for me,” joked the airport chief as he demonstrated a hug for his staff. Longer embraces can be had away from the drop-off zone.
summary: “I’m not a big hugger. Twenty seconds tops for me,” joked the airport chief as he demonstrated a hug for his staff. Longer embraces can be had away from the drop-off zone.

title: Video shows Israeli strike on crowd trying to help wounded boy in Gaza
Why North Korea is sending soldiers to the Russian front lines
content: South Korea has urged Russia to take “immediate” action to withdraw North Korean troops, as Kim Jong Un seeks to strengthen the alliance between Moscow and Pyongyang.
summary: South Korea has urged Russia to take “immediate” action to withdraw North Korean troops, as Kim Jong Un seeks to strengthen the alliance between Moscow and Pyongyang.

title: Video shows Israeli strike on crowd of people trying to help wounded boy
content: Seconds after people rushed to help a 13-year-old boy grievously wounded from a strike in northern Gaza, another strike hit a few feet away.
summary: Seconds after people rushed to help a 13-year-old boy grievously wounded from a strike in northern Gaza, another strike hit a few feet away.

title: Moldova votes to stick with E.U. despite reports of Russian interference
content: The country’s aspiration to join the European Union will now be enshrined in the constitution, but the referendum was incredibly close.

title: Despite uncertainty about U.S. role, Pentagon vows support to Ukraine
content: Lloyd Austin’s trip to Ukraine comes head of an election that could determine whether the United States continues its campaign of massive military support.
summary: Lloyd Austin’s trip to Ukraine comes head of an election that could determine whether the United States continues its campaign of massive military support.

title: Australian senator heckles Charles: ‘You are not my king’
content: Indigenous lawmaker Lidia Thorpe was removed from an event at Australia’s Parliament after accusing the British royal family of “genocide” and stealing land.
summary: Indigenous lawmaker Lidia Thorpe was removed from an event at Australia’s Parliament after accusing the British royal family of “genocide” and stealing land.

title: BRICS is key to Putin’s fight against the U.S. Not all members agree.
content: With Putin confident of a Russian victory in Ukraine, this week’s BRICS summit is designed to send a message that Moscow is back as a powerful global player.
summary: With Putin confident of a Russian victory in Ukraine, this week’s BRICS summit is designed to send a message that Moscow is back as a powerful global player.

title: Iran, weakened by attacks on its allies, braces for Israeli strikes
What will Yahya Sinwar’s death mean for Gaza? Not peace.
content: A cease-fire and hostage release deal doesn’t look that much more likely in the wake of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar’s death.
summary: A cease-fire and hostage release deal doesn’t look that much more likely in the wake of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar’s death.

title: Israel launches strikes on Hezbollah financial system
content: Explosions rocked Beirut’s southern suburbs and sites near the airport late Sunday after the Israeli military said it would begin targeting Hezbollah finances.
summary: Explosions rocked Beirut’s southern suburbs and sites near the airport late Sunday after the Israeli military said it would begin targeting Hezbollah finances.

title: Propaganda war: Israel, Hamas battle over final images of Yahya Sinwar
content: Israel is trying to portray images of the Hamas leader’s final moments as those of a fugitive. His supporters have seized on the same visuals to glorify him as a fighter.
summary: Israel is trying to portray images of the Hamas leader’s final moments as those of a fugitive. His supporters have seized on the same visuals to glorify him as a fighter.
